panels.description: This panel visualizes the memory usage of TiDB processes, including both resident set size (RSS) and various components of memory
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: TiDB cpu usage calculated with process cpu running seconds
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: TiDB process Go garbage collection STW pause duration. (Deprecated in Go v1.22.0 and above)
panels.title: GC STW Duration (last 256 GC cycles)

panels.description: The throughput of Go's memory allocator.
panels.title: Allocator Throughput

panels.description: TiDB side and TiKV side RPC duration.
panels.title: KV RPC Latency

panels.description: TiDB side and PD side TSO RPC duration.
panels.title: TSO RPC Latency

panels.description: Number of requests in each batch
panels.title: Requests Batch Size

panels.description: The time spend on enqueue request
panels.title: Request Enqueue Duration

panels.description: Time spend on enqueue batch into gRPC
panels.title: Batch Enqueue Duration

panels.description: the time goroutines have spent in the scheduler
panels.title: goroutine scheduler lattency

panels.description:
(Available in Go v1.22.0 and above).

 stopping: the time from deciding to stop the world until all Ps are stopped

STW: the time from deciding to stop the world until the world is started again

stopping time is a subset of the total STW time, as it only covers the period when all processors are being stopped.
panels.title: GC STW Latency(>= go1.22.0)

panels.description: This panel shows the proportion of CPU time spent on various activities, including user code execution, garbage collection, and memory scavenging. It helps in understanding how CPU resources are utilized by the Go runtime in TiDB processes.
panels.title: estimated portion of CPU time

panels.description:
auto gc: completed GC cycles generated by the Go runtime
forced gc: completed GC cycles forced by the application
total gc: all completed GC cycles
gc limiter enabled: the number of times the GC CPU limiter has been enabled over the past
panels.title: golang GC

panels.description: Approximate cumulative time goroutines have spent blocked on a sync.Mutex or sync.RWMutex.
panels.title: sync mutex wait
